attributes.action: prevent the current and any past or future Prime Minister and their immediate family from benefiting financially because of their association with that position
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: by introducing a law to prevent the incumbent of the position of Prime Minister, on or after their retirement from that position, from using their former position as a means to gain remuneration unless they give up their right to the pension that they are entitled to and to prevent close relatives of a serving Prime Minister from gaining remuneration by taking advantage of any statute passed by Parliament during the term of office of their relative.
